leonard_morse_cross_exam.source_testimony: I was in my office reviewing client files when I heard Miranda screaming from the conference room. I rushed over and found her standing over Richard's body, looking shocked. She was holding her coffee cup and trembling. I immediately called 911 and tried to secure the scene.

statements.text: The victim died from digitalis poisoning, commonly found in foxglove plants.

statements.text: Based on stomach contents and blood levels, death occurred approximately 11:30 AM.

statements.text: The concentration was high enough to cause rapid cardiac arrest.

statements.text: This was definitely intentional poisoning, not accidental.

dr._sarah_kim_cross_exam.source_testimony: The victim died from digitalis poisoning, commonly found in foxglove plants. Based on stomach contents and blood levels, death occurred approximately 11:30 AM. The concentration was high enough to cause rapid cardiac arrest. This was definitely intentional poisoning, not accidental.

janet_ellis_cross_exam.source_testimony: I manage the office security system and maintain access logs. On the morning of the murder, Miranda badged in at 8:15 AM and Leonard arrived at 8:30 AM. Richard came in at 10:45 AM. The coffee machine in the kitchen was serviced the week before and working normally.
